Title: Relates to net revenue distributed by regional off-track betting corporations
Summary: Directs that any net revenue distributed to participating counties or cities by regional off-track betting corporations shall be used exclusively for real property tax relief.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to net revenue distributed by regional off-track betting corporations
